constructor.details: Sets the initial registry used for cloning escrow contracts.

params._owner: Address of the initial owner of the factory contract.

deployEscrow(uint8,address,address,addre.details: This function clones the specified escrow template and initializes it with specific parameters for the project. It uses the clone factory pattern for deployment to minimize gas costs and manage multiple escrow contract versions.

params._adminManager: Address of the adminManager contract of the escrow platform.
params._client: The client's address who initiates the escrow, msg.sender.
params._escrowType: The type of escrow to deploy, which determines the template used for cloning.
params._registry: Address of the registry contract to fetch escrow implementation.

returns.deployedProxy: The address of the newly deployed escrow proxy.

params._escrowType: The type of escrow contract (FixedPrice, Milestone, or Hourly).

returns.escrowImpl: The address of the escrow implementation.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

deployEscrow(uint8,address,address,addre.notice: Deploys a new escrow contract clone with unique settings for each project.

existingEscrow(address).notice: Tracks the addresses of deployed escrow contracts.

factoryNonce(address).notice: Tracks the number of escrows deployed per deployer to generate unique salts for clones.

getEscrowImplementation(uint8).notice: Fetches the escrow contract implementation address based on the escrow type.

pause().notice: Pauses the contract, preventing new escrows from being deployed.

registry().notice: EscrowRegistry contract address storing escrow templates and configurations.

unpause().notice: Unpauses the contract, allowing new escrows to be deployed.

updateRegistry(address).notice: Updates the registry address used for fetching escrow implementations.

documentation.text: @notice EscrowRegistry contract address storing escrow templates and configurations.
@notice Tracks the number of escrows deployed per deployer to generate unique salts for clones.
@notice Tracks the addresses of deployed escrow contracts.

@notice Updates the registry address used for fetching escrow implementations.
 @param _registry New registry address.
@notice Pauses the contract, preventing new escrows from being deployed.
@notice Unpauses the contract, allowing new escrows to be deployed.

@title EscrowFixedPrice Factory Contract
 @dev This contract is used for creating new escrow contract instances using the clone factory pattern.
